title: ReplyAction
description:
The act of responding to a question/message asked/sent by the object. Related to [[AskAction]]

Related actions:

* [[AskAction]]: Appears generally as an origin of a ReplyAction.

allOf.description: The act of conveying information to another person via a communication medium (instrument) such as speech, email, or telephone conversation.

resultComment.description: A sub property of result. The Comment created or sent as a result of this action.
